casebody.data:
William M. HOFFMAN and Melba L. Hoffman, Leiper's Trailer Camp, v. Frank LIPPNER, Doing Business as Trio Motor Company, Appellant. No. 9242. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Feb. 6, 1947. Decided .March 14, 1947. Raymond A. White, Jr., of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellant. Maurice H. Brown and.Robert M. Bernstein, both of Philadelphia, Pa., for ap-pellee.

Before BIGGS, GOODRICH, and Mc-LAUGHLIN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment, 71 F.Supp 178, affirmed.
